title: Aleksandr Katasonov
text:
Aleksandr Mikhailovich Katasonov (; born 10 April 1972) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and former player.
Career.
In the 2005 Virslīga season he was voted as the best forward in the <a href="Virsl%C4%ABga">Virslīga</a>. In the <a href="LMT%20Virsl%C4%ABga%202006">2006 Virslīga</a> season he played for Liepājas Metalurgs when they finished as runners-up in the league.
Honours.
Liepājas Metalurgs
